string.value: As soon as you reach Level 54, you hear from #b#p1002104##k.
#p1002104# says they've just received word regarding the Black Wings and urges you to go to #b#m250000000##k. Talk to #b#p2090004##k in #m250000000# for more details.

Have you been advancing your levels? I found an interesting piece of information about the Black Wings. This time, you'll have to travel quite a bit. Do you know a town called #b#m250000000##k? You'll have to head there.

Apparently, #b#p2090004##k in #m250000000# somehow met with the Black Wings. I don't know the details. Please go and find out why the Black Wings contacted #p2090004# and what exactly happened between them.
Eh? What is it? Do you need some medicine?

You still haven't gone to #b#m250000000##k yet? Don't tell me you don't know how to get there. #bHead over to #m200000000# station#k and get on #b#p2090005##k, which will take you directly there. Get on #p2090005#, head over to #m250000000#, and meet #p2090004#.
